instructions: Follow the instructions that came with the device to put it in discovery mode. Note: To pair AirPods, see Set up AirPods with iPhone . On iPhone, go to Settings > Bluetooth, turn on Bluetooth, then tap the name of the device.

On your iPhone, open an audio app, such as Music, then choose an item to play. Tap the Playback Destination button , then choose your Bluetooth device. While audio is playing, you can change the playback destination from the Lock screen or Control Center.
